# Data Science Talks

![](www/logo.svg)


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
fun <- function(x){
  read_lines(paste(x, "README.md", sep = "/")) %>% .[[1]] %>%
  gsub("# ", "", .)
}

tbl = dir(full.names = TRUE, recursive=F, pattern="2022") %>%
  tibble(when = .) %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(what = fun(when) ) %>%
  mutate(where = paste("[", when, "](", when, ")")) %>%
  mutate(when = gsub("./", "", when) )

knitr::kable(tbl, "pipe")
```
